state: \b(native of|resident of|resident in|residing in|belongs to|a native of)\s+([A-Z][a-zA-Z&\- ]{2,})\b
occupation: \b(applicant should be a|applicant should be an|applicant should be|the applicant should be a|the applicant should be an|the applicant should be)\s+([A-Za-z\- ]{3,40})\b
\b(beneficiary should be a|beneficiary should be an|beneficiary should be)\s+([A-Za-z\- ]{3,40})\b
\b(the (?:applicant|beneficiary) must be a|the (?:applicant|beneficiary) must be an)\s+([A-Za-z\- ]{3,40})\b
land_area: \b(land area should be at least|land should be at least)\s*(\d+(?:\.\d+)?)\s*(hectares|ha|acre)
relationship: \b(spouse|son|daughter|parent|brother|sister|legal heir|legal heir/ dependent|legal heir\/dependent|close relative|legal heir/dependent)\b
